text: Nia dagi dauwa o Judah mo nadau gau dauwa ala digi wanga ginaadou gi Babylon, ne longono e ginaadou di mee deenei, ginaadou gu madalia a Gedaliah i Mizpah. Nia dagi dauwa aanei la go Ishmael tama daane a Nethaniah, mo Johanan tama daane a Kareah, mo Seraiah tama daane a Tanhumeth, tangada mai di waahale o Netophah, mo Jezaniah tangada mai i Maacah.
